page.syntax: ChangePassword as L (UserName as C, OldPassword as C, NewPassword as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user's password was changed; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: The name of the user as is used during login.

page.description: Changes the password for the user.
page.discussion: Context.Security.ChangePassword() changes the password for the user. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
